verses.verse: And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Is there <S%H3426>yet<s%> any that is <S%H3498>left<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, that I may <S%H6213>shew<s%> him <S%H2617>kindness<s%> for <S%H3083>Jonathan's<s%> sake?

And there was of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> a <S%H5650>servant<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H6717>Ziba<s%>. And when they had <S%H7121>called<s%> him unto <S%H1732>David<s%>, the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Art thou <S%H6717>Ziba<s%>? And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> is he.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Is there <S%H657>not<s%> yet <S%H376>any<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, that I may <S%H6213>shew<s%> the <S%H2617>kindness<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> unto him? And <S%H6717>Ziba<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> hath yet a <S%H1121>son<s%>, which is <S%H5223>lame<s%> on his <S%H7272>feet<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H375>Where<s%> is he? And <S%H6717>Ziba<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, Behold, he is in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5988>Ammiel<s%>, in <S%H3810>Lo-debar<s%>.

¶ Then <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%>, and <S%H3947>fetched<s%> him out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5988>Ammiel<s%>, from <S%H3810>Lo-debar<s%>.

Now when <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, was <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>, he <S%H5307>fell<s%> on his <S%H6440>face<s%>, and did <S%H7812>reverence<s%>. And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%>. And he <S%H559>answered<s%>, Behold thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>!

¶ And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> not: for I will <S%H6213>surely<s%> <S%H6213>shew<s%> thee <S%H2617>kindness<s%> for <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> thy <S%H1>father's<s%> sake, and will <S%H7725>restore<s%> thee all the <S%H7704>land<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> at my <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>.
And he <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself, and <S%H559>said<s%>, What is thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, that thou shouldest <S%H6437>look<s%> upon such a <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H3611>dog<s%> as I am?

¶ Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H6717>Ziba<s%>, <S%H7586>Saul's<s%> <S%H5288>servant<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, I have <S%H5414>given<s%> unto thy <S%H113>master's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> all that <S%H1961>pertained<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and to all his <S%H1004>house<s%>.

Thou therefore, and thy <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, shall <S%H5647>till<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> for him, and thou shalt <S%H935>bring<s%> in the fruits, that thy <S%H113>master's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> may have <S%H3899>food<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%>: but <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%> thy <S%H113>master's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H8548>alway<s%> at my <S%H7979>table<s%>. Now <S%H6717>Ziba<s%> had <S%H2568%H6240>fifteen<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H6717>Ziba<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, According to all that my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%>, so shall thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%>. As for <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%>, said the king, he shall <S%H398>eat<s%> at my <S%H7979>table<s%>, as <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>.

And <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%> had a <S%H6996>young<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4316>Micha<s%>. And all that <S%H4186>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6717>Ziba<s%> were <S%H5650>servants<s%> unto <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%>.

So <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: for he did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> at the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H7979>table<s%>; and was <S%H6455>lame<s%> on <S%H8147>both<s%> his <S%H7272>feet<s%>.
